data_table.description: Sample ID, analyte type, tumor type [primary or recurrent], sample type [tumor or normal] and body site where samples were obtained from participants with pleuropulmonary blastoma and involved in the "Genomic Sequencing of Pleuropulmonary blastoma" project.

variable.name: SAMPLE_TYPE
variable.description: Indicates the Tumor / Normal status of a sample

variable.name: TISSUE SITE
variable.description: General body site where sample was collected [Brain, Lung]

variable.name: TUMOR TYPE
variable.description: Indicates primary or recurrent tumor [Primary, Recurrent]
